titleStmt.title: A diurnall out of the North, or, The daily occurrances of this weeke, with every particular passage at Yorke and Beverley, unto this present 16 of Iuly, 1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Fawcet, for D.C.,

notesStmt.note: Dated at head of t.p.: July, 18.
Verso of p. 7 contains royal arms with init. "C R".
Reproduction of original in British Library.
